forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy. Low around 56, with temperatures rising to around 58 overnight. Southwest wind 7 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers after 8am. Partly sunny. High near 73, with temperatures falling to around 68 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 7 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Saturday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers before 8pm, then rain. Mostly cloudy. Low around 50, with temperatures rising to around 54 overnight. East southeast wind 6 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain. Cloudy, with a high near 67. South southeast wind 7 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Freezing rain and showers and thunderstorms. Cloudy. Low around 28, with temperatures rising to around 32 overnight. East wind around 15 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New ice accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: Freezing rain. Cloudy, with a high near 31. Northeast wind around 15 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New ice accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

forecast.name: Saturday Night

forecast.detailedForecast: Freezing rain before 8am, then freezing rain and rain showers. Cloudy, with a high near 39. East wind around 15 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New ice accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: Nubs with over a foot of snow since Thursday. Upper loops powertilled and tracked again Monday AM. Mid-winter type conditions should continue through the weekend.

nubsNob.liftsOpen: 5 lifts, Rope Tow and Space Worm.
nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails were groomed on Tuesday morning. Expect firm snow in the morning that will transition to softer snow late in the day.
nubsNob.comments: The wet snow from yesterday has firmed up overnight. Expect hard snow this morning that will soften around noon. The best skiing this morning is back on Pintail Peak as that was groomed last. The wind is up from the East today. Coverage on all of our snowmaking runs continues to be very good. Pintail Peak Lodge is open with an espresso bar. The lifts will spin from 9:00 AM to 4:30 PM. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
